HalfDrug.Name: Bitter Medicine
HalfDrug.Description: Eirin's pills are half as effective.

StartMisfortune.Name: Notoriety
StartMisfortune.Description: Begin the game with <h>Eviction Order</h> shuffled into the library.

LowStageRegen.Name: No Time To Rest
LowStageRegen.Description: Gold<Money />, Power <Power /> and life gained after bosses is reduced by half.

LowUpgradeRate.Name: Hyperinflation
LowUpgradeRate.Description: You are half as likely to find Upgraded cards and Takane's shop prices are 10% more expensive.

PayForUpgrade.Name: Training At A Price
PayForUpgrade.Description: Upgrading non-Basic cards at Gaps costs 25 <Money />.

NightMana.Name: Nighttime Fatigue
NightMana.Description: At the start of combat, add a <h>Long Night</h> card to the hand.
